Un classique mais décevant par rapport au premier du nom.
Comme si le jeu était une démo technique.
Des bons passages, la musique est sympa, l'histoire avance et se complexifie, des passages chiants (véhicules), les PNJ dans le passage.

我是01后，人生第一个单机大作就是半条命！我在小学的时候让一个同学推荐的，当时玩的是盗版，玩过盗版的半条命1和2，但是当时都没有通关，反而还被下个半死！尤其是 我们不去莱温霍姆（童年阴影）！！！
不过当时半条命2居然能在我家那台破电脑运行真的是绝了！后来慢慢接触了steam，上了大学有了点钱，遇上了steam冬促，光是v社的大作我就买疯了，求生之路，半条命，传送门。这些小时候想玩的现在都有了！我非常开心！
现在我已经把半条命2通关了，准备接下来开始半条命2第一章，嘻嘻。我会和弗里曼博士共同挥舞着物理学圣剑继续前进！也希望有生之年能看到G胖大哥数3。

今天是2020年12月31日，戈登 · 弗里曼的故事还在继续。。。。。。
Took away the other half of my life
one of my favorite games. completed all the objectives. love the story.
1 DE hiç birşey anlamadın ama 2.de bu kadar iyi olmaz

Half-Life 2 is still the greatest FPS ever made. ... The fact is that Half-Life 2 still executes its concepts, conceits and mechanics more effectively, deftly, and powerfully than almost any of its imitators have in the 10 years since. That's why it's still the best, and that's why I'm still playing it.
bu oyun bir harika içinde ne ararsanız var bulmaca var savaş var gizli yerler var heyecan var bence fiyatına bakmayın direk alın
oyun tam bir klasik kesinlikle sistem gereksinimlerine bakmayın oyunu hemen alın patates'e işlemci taksanız oynatır özellikle fizik motorunun size hissettirdiği tatminkarlık hiçbir oyunda yok
Вечно молодая игра Half:Life. С ней я познакомился еще в комп. клубе
это классика , это знать надо! Ну а так все круто игра кайф кроме 2 моментов. В игре галимое управление транспортом и персонажем. 9/10
Best single player game ever i played and when is the next sequel ?
stories great and the graphics are honestly still pretty good considering when it came out.
its a great game.  i wish more people knew about it.
Fantastic game and sieries. So much fun to play around with the physics engine. and good practice for FPS

Game has good physic mechanics, cool shooting, tense story moments, horror elements, action elements mixed with syfi. Interesting storyline and worth the very cheap price in the sale. Shame valve can't count to 3.

I love this game so much! Was one of the first games I bought with my own money. First day, i spent 6 hours straight playing it, lol. Totally check out "Freeman's Mind" by Accursed Farms (Ross Scott) if you like the Half Life franchise.

I just beat the game and OH BOY Is it one of the most FUN experiences i've ever had in a game. First of all, the game looks better than most games in 2020. This game was made in 2004! The controls are easy to learn and the puzzles are challenging and fun. I loved trying to use my brain to figure out where to go next, or finding cool secrets/easter eggs in the game. The mechanics and features are also amazing. I loved how you fight the antlions at first, and then you get to tame and control them for the next chapter. Or how you have to use the grenades to your advantage when dodging the scanner turrets. The AI is suprisingly good too. When you get teams, they'll move out the way for you, they'll heal you, and say realistic dialogue. Honestly this is genuinely one of the BEST games I have and will ever play, and that is a Fact. HIGHLY RECOMMEND!

Great fun with a super good story, the shotgun was fun to play with and the gravity gun really motivated you to play the game in diffirent ways.

The poisoned headcrab really scared me the first time I saw it :(

A great game with a wonderful story and a few bugs sprinkled on top to spice things up. It's worth the price, even when it's not on sale!

One of the best FPS games ever made. 100% recommend

Half Life 2 will always be a phenomenal fps game, it's way of story telling is incredible, the characters are great, and so on.

Excelente juego me trae nostalgia y recuerdos, deseaba tanto jugarlo cuando era mas chico intentar tener un PC para correr el juego, hoy en día no es nada.
_El juego para en su tiempo y sus gráficos son excelentes, obvio te atrapa la trama como todos conocemos del Half-Life, pero aún así hoy en día requiere una modificación de gráficos, mejoras en las físicas o intentar que sea como la de Black Mesa y Xen.

Gordon Freeman

from the 4.1 hours ive spent in this game, i was so impressed by the glass physics it gave me a boner. I was so impressed i have played with the glass for multiple hours, restarting from my last checkpoint each time all the glass was broken. This game is ok from what i have played till now, i cant really discuss that cuz of my continues cum shots when breaking the glass.

An insight into one of the most revolutionary games ever...

Whilst it's age shows sometimes this game still shines bright with it's amazing voice acting, suprisingly emotive character animations and fantastic level design and music

The only downside is this game either makes you feel old or wish you weren't so young so that you could've experienced this gem at release!

This is a must play for anyone who considers themselves a "gamer" if only to respect the history of it but it's dystopian world is fascinatingly grim and sometimes foreshadows authoritarian regimes at their worst.

Play. This. Game.
